title: Installation issue: Rust bootstrap needs GLIBCXX_3.4.26
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue

Installing rust fails seemingly because the pre-build dependencies were compiled with a newer compiler than that of the OS (RedHat 8 with gcc 8.3.1)

GLIBCXX_3.4.26 corresponds to `gcc@9.1.0` 

@AndrewGaspar - do you know if the binary objects used to bootstrap change regularly? The same rust version built correctly a few months ago.

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install rust
...

Building LLVM for x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
running: "cmake" "/tmp/dcsrsoft/spack-stage/spack-stage-rust-1.48.0-7t4ndux36cuxchdkk6swh6gylqdonprd/spack-src/src/llvm-project/llvm" "-G" "Ninja" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_ASSERTIONS=OFF" "-DLLVM_TARGETS_TO_BUILD=AArch64;ARM;Hexagon;MSP430;Mips;NVPTX;PowerPC;RISCV;Sparc;SystemZ;WebAssembly;X86" "-DLLVM_EXPERIMENTAL_TARGETS_TO_BUILD=AVR" "-DLLVM_INCLUDE_EXAMPLES=OFF" "-DLLVM_INCLUDE_TESTS=OFF" "-DLLVM_INCLUDE_DOCS=OFF" "-DLLVM_INCLUDE_BENCHMARKS=OFF" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_TERMINFO=OFF" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_LIBEDIT=OFF" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_BINDINGS=OFF" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_Z3_SOLVER=OFF" "-DLLVM_PARALLEL_COMPILE_JOBS=48" "-DLLVM_TARGET_ARCH=x86_64" "-DLLVM_DEFAULT_TARGET_TRIPLE=x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_ZLIB=ON" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_LIBXML2=OFF" "-DLLVM_VERSION_SUFFIX=-rust-1.48.0-stable" "-DCMAKE_INSTALL_MESSAGE=LAZY" "-DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/dcsrsoft/spack/hetre/v1.2/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc" "-DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/dcsrsoft/spack/hetre/v1.2/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++" "-DCMAKE_ASM_COMPILER=/dcsrsoft/spack/hetre/v1.2/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -fPIC -m64" "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=-ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -fPIC -m64" "-DCMAKE_AR=/usr/bin/ar" "-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/tmp/dcsrsoft/spack-stage/spack-stage-rust-1.48.0-7t4ndux36cuxchdkk6swh6gylqdonprd/spack-src/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/llvm" "-DCMAKE_ASM_FLAGS= -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -fPIC -m64" "-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release"
cmake: /lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.26' not found (required by cmake)
thread 'main' panicked at '
command did not execute successfully, got: exit code: 1
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->

```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.2-2976-e37d663881
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-rhel8-zen2
* **Concretizer:** clingo
```

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information

The problem is present for 1.51.0 and 1.48.0 (I haven't tried other versions) but interestingly 1.48.0 built correctly a month or so ago on the 21st of April:

From the old spack-build-out.txt (attached as 20210421-spack-build-out.txt) we see:

```
running: "cmake" "/tmp/dcsrsoft/spack-stage/spack-stage-rust-1.48.0-wkqpvor3c5sze6z25k2yxtrykt7h3kkr/spack-src/src/llvm-project/llvm" "-G" "Ninja" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_ASSERTIONS=OFF" "-DLLVM_TARGETS_TO_BUILD=AArch64;ARM;Hexagon;MSP430;Mips;NVPTX;PowerPC;RISCV;Sparc;SystemZ;WebAssembly;X86" "-DLLVM_EXPERIMENTAL_TARGETS_TO_BUILD=AVR" "-DLLVM_INCLUDE_EXAMPLES=OFF" "-DLLVM_INCLUDE_TESTS=OFF" "-DLLVM_INCLUDE_DOCS=OFF" "-DLLVM_INCLUDE_BENCHMARKS=OFF" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_TERMINFO=OFF" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_LIBEDIT=OFF" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_BINDINGS=OFF" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_Z3_SOLVER=OFF" "-DLLVM_PARALLEL_COMPILE_JOBS=48" "-DLLVM_TARGET_ARCH=x86_64" "-DLLVM_DEFAULT_TARGET_TRIPLE=x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_ZLIB=ON" "-DLLVM_ENABLE_LIBXML2=OFF" "-DLLVM_VERSION_SUFFIX=-rust-1.48.0-stable" "-DCMAKE_INSTALL_MESSAGE=LAZY" "-DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/dcsrsoft/spack/hetre/v1.1/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc" "-DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/dcsrsoft/spack/hetre/v1.1/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++" "-DCMAKE_ASM_COMPILER=/dcsrsoft/spack/hetre/v1.1/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -fPIC -m64" "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=-ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -fPIC -m64" "-DCMAKE_AR=/usr/bin/ar" "-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/tmp/dcsrsoft/spack-stage/spack-stage-rust-1.48.0-wkqpvor3c5sze6z25k2yxtrykt7h3kkr/spack-src/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/llvm" "-DCMAKE_ASM_FLAGS= -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -fPIC -m64" "-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release"

```



<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt]()
* [spack-build-env.txt]()
 *



<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6615214/spack-build-env.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6615215/spack-build-out.txt)
[20210421-spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6615257/20210421-spack-build-out.txt)

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
